name: Silver
descriptions: Sara Silver is a former citizen of Megaton hiding out within Springvale's only habitable building, the small ranch, in 2277.
Silver was a prostitute who worked for Colin Moriarty in Megaton before they had a falling out and she ran off with her share of her earnings (or so she says), deciding to hide out in Springvale.

She told Moriarty that she was done hooking and was taking the caps she had earned fair and square; she even slept with him to seal the deal. The next morning Moriarty told her she could not leave, but she grabbed her caps and ran for it.

topics.response_text: Yeah? What is it?Play soundFO3 Silver WhatIsIt.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_WhatIsIt.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Yes, and he says you owe him some caps.
topics.response_text: That bastard! He... he's a liar! He just wants me dead! Those caps are all mine. I earned them!Play soundFO3 Silver ThatBastard.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_ThatBastard.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Just hand over the caps, and I'll be out of your way.
topics.response_text: Owe HIM some caps? He's a liar! He just wants you to kill me! Those caps are mine, fair and square.Play soundFO3 Silver OweHimSomeCaps.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_OweHimSomeCaps.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I don't deal with junkies. Hand over all your caps. Now!
topics.response_text: You're not getting a damn thing from me! You hear me?! Not a damn thing!Play soundFO3 Silver NotGettingAThing.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_NotGettingAThing.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Slow down. Tell me your side of the story.
topics.response_text: Look, I used to work for that slob. Doing... you know... favors for guys.Play soundFO3 Silver UsedToWorkFor.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_UsedToWorkFor.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Look, just give me the caps and I'll tell him you're gone.
topics.response_text: I am tired of hiding out here like some kind of Wasteland dog.Play soundFO3 Silver TiredOfHiding.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_TiredOfHiding.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I don't care. I'm just here for caps.
topics.response_text: Is there something wrong with your hearing? I just told you the caps are mine! You can't have them!Play soundFO3 Silver SomethingWrong.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_SomethingWrong.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Look, just give me some of your caps, and I'll tell him you're gone.
topics.response_text: You'd do that for me? I never expected anyone to care enough.Play soundFO3 Silver YoudDoThat.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_YoudDoThat.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I don't know. Maybe Moriarty's right and you're just a junkie.
topics.response_text: Look... I feel awful about what I used to have to do for a living, okay? I use the Psycho to make the memories go away.Play soundFO3 Silver IFeelAwful.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_IFeelAwful.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You know what, keep your caps and I'll tell Moriarty you're gone.
topics.response_text: You'd do that for me? I can't believe it... you hardly even know me!Play soundFO3 Silver CantBelieveIt.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_CantBelieveIt.oggnoicon
Colin Moriarty... the owner of Moriarty's Saloon in Megaton.Play soundFO3 Silver ColinMoriarty.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_ColinMoriarty.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Whoa, calm down... Who the hell is Moriarty?
topics.response_text: Colin Moriarty... the owner of Moriarty's Saloon in Megaton.Play soundFO3 Silver ColinMoriarty.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_ColinMoriarty.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You'd better calm down, before I put you down.
topics.response_text: That lying bastard. Roped you into finding me too, huh?Play soundFO3 Silver ThatLyingBastard.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_ThatLyingBastard.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You don't still offer your... services, do you?
topics.response_text: No, sorry. I've left that part of my life behind.Play soundFO3 Silver LeftThatPart.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_LeftThatPart.oggnoicon
Who knows. Shoot myself up until I forget who I am?Play soundFO3 Silver WhoKnows.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_WhoKnows.oggnoicon

Look, I don't know who you are. I'm not just handing over my life's earnings to you!Play soundFO3 Silver DontKnowWhoYouAre.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Silver_DontKnowWhoYouAre.oggnoicon
